com.codemelon.graph.vertex

Interface EdgeColorVertex<E extends EdgeColorData>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EdgeDataVertex<E>, Vertex
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    KruskalVertex<E>, PrimVertex<E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UndirectedKruskalVertex, UndirectedPrimVertex

    public interface EdgeColorVertex<E extends EdgeColorData>
extends EdgeDataVertex<E>
    Vertex that maintains a Color for its adjacencies

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color getEdgeColor(EdgeColorVertex<E> to)
      Retrieve the color of the edge whose head is the given vertex

      Set the color of the edge whose head is the given vertex.

    • Method Detail

      • setEdgeColor

        void setEdgeColor(EdgeColorVertex<E> to,
                Color color)
        Set the color of the edge whose head is the given vertex.
